UI_TEXT.Name: Name
Click the button below to load from an image...
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~到目前为止，你通过此节点总共保存了{total_cou:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes! You have saved images {total_count} times with this node.
The default save path is 'output/ZML/[current_date]'. Clearing the path saves to 'output'. Custom paths outside of ComfyUI are supported.
'Text Block Storage' writes text into the PNG, useful for saving prompts. Use a 'Load Image' node to extract it.
'Clear Metadata' reduces file size. When used with 'Text Block Storage', it first clears metadata, then writes the text block, resulting in a small file with your prompt but no workflow data. This pairs well with image scaling.
'Save .txt File' saves a text file with image name, resolution, metadata status, and text block content.
Filename convention: The separator is '#-#'. 'Forward' normalization reads text before the first '#-#'. 'Backward' normalization reads text after the last '#-#'. For example, from 'Action#-#000001#-#InADream.PNG', 'Forward' gives 'Action', and 'Backward' gives 'InADream'.
Enjoy using ZML Nodes!
UI_TEXT.留空为透明字体; 输入'ZML'为随机填充色: Leave blank for transparent font; enter 'ZML' for random fill color
UI_TEXT.留空则不描边; 输入'ZML'为随机颜色: Leave blank for no stroke; enter 'ZML' for random color
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~到目前为止，你通过此节点总共添加了{count}次水印:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes! You have added watermarks {count} times with this node!
Leaving the color code blank means transparent. Enter 'ZML' for a random color. You can leave the text color blank and keep the stroke color as default to create a transparent stroke font!
Here are some common color codes:
Black: #000000
White: #FFFFFF
Red: #FF0000
Blue: #0000FF
Yellow: #FFFF00
Green: #008000
Wish you a happy day!
UI_TEXT.根据字体大小决定图像尺寸: Image Size Determined by Font Size
UI_TEXT.根据图像尺寸决定字体大小: Font Size Determined by Image Size
UI_TEXT.字体大小和图像尺寸独立计算: Font Size and Image Size Calculated Independently
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~到目前为止，你通过此节点总共添加了{node_exec:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes! You have added text images {node_execution_count} times with this node!
Entering 'ZML' for color code means a random color.

By default, this node generates a blank text image without a background. When an image is connected, the text image will be automatically spliced to the input image.

This node also supports multiple batches of images! It will automatically sort them and assign numbers. When the concatenation direction is left/right, the sorting direction is top-to-bottom. When the concatenation direction is top/bottom, the sorting direction is left-to-right.
The default starting number is '1' and the step is '1'. If you want to customize the starting number and step, you can use the format '#x:x#', where 'x' represents a number. The first 'x' is the starting number, and the second is the step. When '#x:x#' format is active, you can also add prefix and suffix text! For example, if the input is 'ZML_#0:0.5#_Haha', the output numbers will be 'ZML_0_Haha', 'ZML_0.5_Haha' etc. Of course, it also supports multi-line text!

You can use the 'Uniform Image Resolution' node to input and process multiple images, then input them to this 'Text to Image' node!
Wish you a happy day!
